Cc: 
(USANYS)
Subject: RE: 
How about Monday I lam? 
> wrote: 
On May 7, 2020 17:10, " (USANYS)" < > wrote: 
Great. We're still working remotely, but perhaps we could set up a  call for early next week? Would Monday or Tuesday 
work for you? 
From: 
(CID) (FBI) 
Sent: Thursday, May 7, 2020 5:09 PM 
To: 
. (NY) (FBI) al>; 
Cc: (USANYS)
Subject: RE: 
(USANYS) 
Let 
me know what works for you and M, I am back from DC and am available to meet anytime. 
On May 7, 2020 17:06, " (USANYS)" ffi•  wrote: 
Thanks very much, And thanks for the virtual introduction. welcome and very much look forward to working 
with you. Once you're settled, and I would love to set up a time to talk through this and some of the other cases 
we have going with your squads. 
And thanks very much for everything over the past few months, .  Really appreciate it. I have no doubt we will 
continue to talk regularly about MCC and our other cases together. 
Best, 
EFTA00016605

• 
From: (NY) (FBI) •c> 
Sent: Thursday, May 7, 202010:53 AM 
To: ( USANYS) 
Cc: (CID) (FBI) < 
Subject: 
>; 
(USANYS) 
Thank you for the call and the update on the Epstein investigation with regard to charging Ghislaine Maxwell. 
As I mentioned, (copied) has been chosen as the permanent ASAC for the NYO's Violent Crime/Gang Branch of 
the Criminal Division. will be coordinating with you, and the rest of the team as we move forward. 
To rehash some of the points regarding Maxwell to get up to speed with the latest: 
SDNY is close to a final decision on charging Maxwell regarding her complicity in Epstein's sex trafficking 
FBI believes (as of January) that Maxwell is still living with a friend in the Boston suburb of Manchester by the Sea 
Confirmed by historical pen register with cell site location and subpoenas to Amazon for delivery location 
Since traditional surveillance, including a pole camera, are not suitable due to the secluded location, and in order to get 
more recent information, you propose getting a renewed pen register and Amazon subpoena. Additionally, you and the 
team may seek to get a mail cover. 
M, It was a pleasure working with you, and the team for the last several months. 
Good luck moving forward with the case. 
Best regards, 
Supervisory Special Agent 
FBI New York 
EFTA00016606
